casebody.data:
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE
v.
GRAYBAR ELECTRIC COMPANY, INC. 153A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 20, 2019

Kay Miller Hobart, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Graybar Electric Company, Inc.

Ronald D. Williams, II, Assistant Attorney General, For North Carolina Department of Revenue.

Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, For North Carolina Department of Revenue.

James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitor General, For North Carolina Department of Revenue.

*849The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 20th of August 2019 by Petitioner:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2019."

Petitioner shall have up to and including the 3rd day of October 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
